description: This file defines the User entity class for the user management system, including fields for email, name, authentication details, and timestamps, with persistence annotations for ORM mapping.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Entity class representing a user in the system with fields for contact, authentication, and timestamps, using JPA annotations for ORM mapping.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes createdAt and updatedAt timestamps before persisting.

methods.name: onUpdate
methods.description: Updates the updatedAt timestamp before updating the entity.
